7309.name: Elevation Church
7309.description: Elevation Church streams powerful sermons from Pastor Steven Furtick and dynamic worship from Elevation Worship 24/7. Life-changing messages and passionate praise, anytime, anywhere. Grow in faith, find hope, and encounter God’s presence through preaching and worship.

5273.name: CrimeFlix - Free Crime TV That’ll Keep You Hooked
5273.description: Totally hooked on true crime? CrimeFlix on STIRR delivers the goods—FREE. Binge gripping police dramas, twisted murder mysteries, and real cases that’ll blow your mind. No subscriptions, no BS. Just pure crime content that keeps you guessing until 3 AM.

6643.name: Mi Raza Canal Plus
6643.description: Películas y series contemporáneas de primer nivel de México, América Latina y España, dobladas o producidas en español.

6641.name: Mi Raza Canal
6641.description: A channel featuring Mexican and Latin American content. It offers a diverse range of entertainment, including independent films, action movies, comedies, documentaries, and series. The channel showcases Mexican culture, narco-themed content, and works by Latino filmmakers.

7047.name: INTRAVEL
7047.description: INTRAVEL is Insight TV’s travel and lifestyle FAST channel, taking viewers on unforgettable journeys to breathtaking destinations, featuring authentic stories, global adventures, and culinary experiences from master storytellers and creators.
